DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Measuring number radiolabeled white blood cell non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma tumor may help doctor predict well patient respond treatment , may help study cancer future . PURPOSE : This study measure radiolabeled white blood cell patient non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma .
DOC.brief_title: Imaging Radiolabeled White Blood Cells Patients With Non-Hodgkin 's Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine number indium In 111-labeled peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMCs ) indium In 111-labeled polymorphonuclear leukocyte ( PMNLs ) traffic lymphoma tumor prior therapy patient non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma . - Compare number PBMC PMNL traffic prior vs therapy patient . - Compare , preliminarily , number vivo baseline ( i.e. , pre-therapy ) traffic PBMCs v PMNLs patient . - Gather important data regard inter- intra-patient variability effector cell traffic tumor . - Assess relationship response 8-12 week magnitude baseline effector cell traffic magnitude post-rituximab effector cell traffic patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients assign 1 2 group . - Group I : Patients receive autologous indium In 111 ( ^111In ) -labeled peripheral blood mononuclear cell day 0 . - Group II : Patients receive autologous ^111In-labeled polymorphonuclear leukocyte day 0 . In group , patient undergo blood collection day 0 . Patients undergo full-body single-photon emission-computed tomography ( SPECT ) scan 4 hour cell infusion day 2 . The label imaging process may repeat least 1 course anticancer treatment . Cellular uptake measure reader/visual interpretation , semiquantitative grading system , tumor-to-background uptake ratio . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 100 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically cytologically confirm nonHodgkin 's lymphoma Indolent aggressive disease Planning receive new regimen start regimen cancer therapy At least one tumor lesion measurable two dimension ≥ 1.5 cm CT scan PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : ECOG performance status ( PS ) 02 OR Karnofsky PS 60100 % Life expectancy ≥ 3 month No concurrent medical complication would preclude study compliance Not pregnant nursing PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : At least 3 week since prior chemotherapy ( except nonmyelosuppressive treatment ) At least 3 week since prior radiation therapy Concurrent rituximab allow
